item.title: Bananarama - Venus
item.description:
A goddess on
a mountain top was
Burning like
a silver flame
The summit of
beauty and love and
Venus was her name
she’s got it
Yeah baby
she’s got it
I’m your venus
I’m your fire
At your desire
well I’m your venus

at your desire

were her crystal eyes
Making every man mad

what no one else had
